channel.title: [PI] Drops are Glitched
channel.description: Please delete this, I fixed it.

item.title: [PI] Drops are Glitched
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

It’s all, even when I drop an item it shows multiple of that 1 item I dropped but you can only pick up 1. So what methods would I have to fix in order to fix this issue?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Drops are Glitched
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

joeyscape:

I actually have a different drop system, it loads in my config and its not just for bones btw its for all item drops but I’m going to take a look at my grounditem method and I’ll post it if i can’t find out what’s causing this problem, thanks for taking the time to help out aswell ;).

Well is this for everything or just mob drops? Try dropping an item if it is just for mob drops you need to show where it is being executed when the mob drops the item.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Drops are Glitched
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

So I investigated a little bit, in PI drops are handled as such:

createGroundItem(Client c, int itemId, int itemX, int itemY, int itemAmount, int playerId)

where item amount is loaded as the second parameter in NPCDrops

From here I would check NPCDrops.TSM, find your NPC id, and find the id for the bones being dropped. To drop only one, replace:

boneId:XXXX

with:

boneId:1

Now the server may handle bone drops from a different source since bones are dropped every time instead of as chance. I did find:

public int boneDrop(int type)

in NPCHandler, but could not find anywhere it was called.

Good luck, and let me know if it works out.

Read full topic

item.description:

how many bones did they have when they died

if it was 1 it sounds like the server is sending the packet multiple times to the client and in reality those items don’t exist

I remember whooping defiled in arcanists several times
